EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_QCon London_Q118.Post Event Email QCon
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending QCon London last week
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for joining Pivotal at QCon London 2018 <[[https://qconlondon.com/]]>. We hope you came away inspired, with new insights on how startups and enterprises build and manage complex, resilient, distributed systems. If you’d like to talk to us about arranging a hands-on workshop in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-qcon-london-q118]]>.
In the meantime, if you’re looking for new ways to accelerate your journey into serverless development, data science, and cloud-native applications, our website has a wealth of articles <[[https://pivotal.io/topics?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-qcon-london-q118]]>, papers <[[https://content.pivotal.io/resources ?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-qcon-london-q118]]>and talks to get you started.
View some recent highlights here <[[content.pivotal.io/qcon-london-2018?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-qcon-london-q118]]>.
Many of the excellent talks from the recent SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-qcon-london-q118]]> are now available online <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-qcon-london-q118]]>, including these highlights <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017-highlights?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-qcon-london-q118]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
P.S. - For more in-depth presentations on cloud-native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-qcon-london-q118]]>. The event takes place September 24-27 in Washington D.C.
